home.h3: Design new or extend existing software systems
home.h4: Requirements Elicitation, Analysis, System Design, Detailed Design, Implementation, Testing
home.t1: Longtime experience in software development in various application domains
home.t2: Integration into existing projects, including large-scale legacy systems
home.t3: Development of new systems from scratch and long-term maintenance and support

services.title: Services
services.h3: Overview of the types of services we provide
services.t1: Integration into existing systems and projects
services.t2: Developing of new systems from scratch based on customer requirements
services.t3: Integration or building up specific phases of the software development cycle like Performance Optimisation, DevOps, Testing, etc.
services.t5: Consulting activities for existing or future projects

methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.h3: Select processes, methods and tools for specific project environment
methodology.t1: Evaluate how much and how to involve the client in the process depending on the client's domain knowledge and decision power
methodology.t2: Estimate how much planning is optimal depending on the project's predictability
methodology.t3: Try to balance between the complexity, maintainability and usability of software models
methodology.t4: Choose the appropriate software development process (XP, Scrum, Waterfall, or custom) depending on complexity and change factor
